name: One Step Lasagna
author: Bonnie LeGrand

(15 oz.) container Ricotta cheese or cottage cheese

instructions: Combine browned beef with water and spaghetti sauce in a bowl. Cover bottom of 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish with 1 1/2 cups of sauce. Arrange layer of uncooked noodles, slightly overlapping, on top of sauce. Spread half of the Ricotta and half of the Mozzarella and 2 tea- spoons Parmesan over the noodles. Add another layer of sauce. Re- peat with another layer of noodles, the remaining Ricotta and Mozzarella and 2 teaspoons of Parmesan. Top with layer of noodles. Pour remaining sauce over; spreading evenly to cover edges of noodles. Sprinkle with 1?2 cup Parmesan. Cover tightly with foil. Set on cookie sheet and bake in preheated 350Â° oven for 1 hour. Let stand, covered 10 minutes.
